title: Thoughts on Butcher's Bridge
body:
The map is absolutely disgusting. It looks so horrible I want to shoot myself.

I understand Riot is trying to make the game a bit more fun but seriously, the new, temporary Howling Abyss is an absolute killer. I already know there's been a plethora of threads/discussions about the new HUD (pretty sure all of them are negative) and I do agree. 

The new map should just get removed in general and things should revert back. It's a pain to look at and play and for me, personally, is extremely unappealing. I'm not sure if it's only me but touching on the HUD, I don't like how the items are on the right side instead of the left :(
